title: Will their loved ones be allowed in? L.A.'s Iranian community on edge over Trump travel rules
text: "There's still a lot of confusion about how this affects people, how this affects family members," Qazi said. "Community members are extremely concerned. The [visa] process is already so thorough and it's been that way for a very long time. To say someone can't come in because they're from a certain country… we know what this is about. This is about excluding Muslims as much as possible."
summary:
"There's still a lot of confusion about how this affects people, how this affects family members," Qazi said.
"Community members are extremely concerned.
The [visa] process is already so thorough and it's been that way for a very long time.
To say someone can't come in because they're from a certain country… we know what this is about.
This is about excluding Muslims as much as possible."
